description: Very fine French green beans are best for this recipe, but the dressing also works well on larger beans. The cooking time varies depending on the size of the beans.
keywords: Vegetable dishes,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Green beans,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Green Beans With Parsley Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g fine green beans, topped and tailed

recipeInstructions.text: In a large saucepan of lightly salted boiling water, add the beans and cook for 8-10 minutes, or until tender but not soft. Drain well and refresh under cold running water. Keep warm.
Meanwhile, combine the parsley, garlic, and oil in a small bowl. Season well.
Tip the beans into a serving bowl, stir to coat with the persillade, and serve warm.
